thread.title: Cuba’s main seaside resort Varadero to be declared Urban Area with heritage valueTravelandtourworld.com
thread.title_full: Cuba’s main seaside resort Varadero to be declared Urban Area with heritage valueTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Cuba’s main seaside resort Varadero to be declared Urban Area with heritage valueTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Cuba’s main seaside resort Varadero to be declared Urban Area with heritage value Published on : Friday, September 18, 2015
Cuba’s main seaside resort, an area of some 400 hectares of Varadero, will be declared Urban Area with Historical and Cultural Value by the National Monuments Commission.
Mayra Hernandez, director of the Office of Monuments of the western province of Matanzas said that Varadero has 88 buildings with heritage value, 47 out of them are included in category 1, 26 ones in the category 2 and 15 buildings in category 3, mainly by the vernacular architecture (wood) and stonework.
Varadero is among the top 10 sun-and-beach destinations in the world. Notably, in 2014 was visited for the seventh consecutive year by more than one million foreign tourists.
The declaration ceremony is to take place at the Conference Center Plaza America, during the 4th National Workshop Museology and Society, scheduled for September 22 to 24 in Matanzas.
The declaration aims to maintain and preserve the historical, cultural, architectural and environmental value of the well known resort, said Hernandez to Prensa Latina news agency.
